divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog at 5 pm on a neighborhood street when I impulsively turned around to look at the sky behind me. Immediately there, in the same area that I have seen other unexplainable things previously reported, I saw a bright yellow oval shaped star traveling level and steady for 5 seconds until it was behind a cloud. I kept looking for it to emerge, but it didn't. I had enough time to assess- not a plane, not a star, not a shooting star. A few hours later, the local military base had a searchlight doing a 45 degree back and forth pattern not directed at the area of my sighting. I have never seen the base use a searchlight before.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kaneohe
There were no other sightings in Kaneohe on or around February 9th 2013
Summary: large oval shaped star traveled behind cloud, did not emerge
